subject: College Athletics
lead_paragraph: George Mitchell, the former senator brought in to monitor Penn State, said the university had gotten “off to a very good start” in responding to N.C.A.A. sanctions for the Jerry Sandusky child sexual abuse scandal.
snippet: George Mitchell, the former senator brought in to monitor Penn State, said the university had gotten “off to a very good start” in responding to N.C.A.A. sanctions for the Jerry Sandusky child sexual abuse scandal.
